description:
- Arcade shooter created for novice to pro: all skill levels welcome.
- Play with your friends or against world hi-scores.
- Unlock new ships, new upgrades and expert mode.
- Highly re-playable!

Galaxy is in danger with hostile ships swarming from the opening vortex. Blast the swarming hordes with huge variety of upgradeable ships. This frenetic arcade space shooter featuring worldwide leader-boards and intense local multiplayer mode will keep you playing until all ships are unlocked and galaxies saved.

Game features:
- Up to 3 simultaneous local players
- 11 ship models (evolving up to 4 levels max)
- 4 levels of difficulty. Adapted for all skill levels
- 2 Game dimensions: Metal and Neon Dimension. (affects difficulty, number of levels and enemies)
- 16 Game filters: Arcade, Phosphor CRT, VHS, Monochrome, Vintage, Lomo colours, Psychedelic, etc...
- Fireworks particles festival
- Online leader-boards (coming soon!)
- Tons of individual ship upgrades
- Over 150 levels featuring the innovative Vortex System, bosses and bonus
- Multiplayer designed gameplay
- Action Neo-retro FX and music
- Arcade coin-op: Design and integration
name: Vortex Attack EX
